title: (Lissandra) you know you aren't a mage when
body:
Rito say so.

The following** mages ** / tank supports are being changed to have** 6 base mana regeneration (mp5) and +0.8 mana regeneration (mp5) **growth stat:

{{champion:103}} , {{champion:12}} , {{champion:34}} , {{champion:1}} , {{champion:268}} (mana is the problem, not the fact that he's a living bug),
 {{champion:53}} , {{champion:63}} , {{champion:69}} (mana is the real problem, not **Stashu**), 
{{champion:131}} , {{champion:60}} , {{champion:9}} , {{champion:105}} , {{champion:3}} , {{champion:79}} , {{champion:74}} ;  {{champion:126}} , {{champion:43}} , {{champion:30}} , {{champion:38}} , {{champion:10}} , {{champion:7}} , {{champion:89}} , {{champion:117}} , {{champion:99}} , {{champion:90}} , {{champion:25}} , {{champion:76}} , {{champion:61}} , {{champion:13}} , {{champion:50}} , {{champion:134}} , {{champion:44}} , 
{{champion:412}} (No doubt C.T.'s son deserves it more than Lissandra), 
{{champion:4}} , {{champion:45}} , {{champion:161}} , {{champion:112}} , {{champion:101}} , {{champion:115}} , {{champion:26}} , {{champion:143}} 



Apparently Rito believes that a **free spell every 18s** is so op that Lissandra deserves an horrible **mana regen 5.67 (+0.4)**
 (Meanwhile: *Insert manaless champs with more range than Lissandra and a real passive*)

Not to mention the new regen items that scales with **BASE STATS** (**NERF**), but fear not Rito is on the case.

replies.body:
Wow i honestly didnt even realize that they excluded Lissandra from the mana regen changes.

It really doesnt make sense that shes penalized for having her passive. At this point she basically doesnt even have a passive considering she also has the lowest mana regen in the game. She now has 7.5 less mana regen than every other mage at lvl 18.

And yet they included champions like Swain and Xerath who also have mana sustain passives.

I feel like Riot has completely forgotten about Lissandra in general, she could really use a small range increase on her Q, would make her a much better champion overall.

I'm hoping this was simply an oversight on Riot's part and that more will change during the preseason.

It'd be stupid for her to have both high costs *AND* poor Mp5 just to pay for a fairly weak passive.

Yeah, you're right. That is why she is never picked in the game. Because everything about her is shit and she is a free win for the other team. Needs 100 buffs.

the entire game isn't about how much damage a champion can do... I mean look at champions like kassadin there were plenty of people in about every nerf saying that karthus had the lowest burst of every mid lane champion and despite being perma banned picked in all elo's apparentlly kassadin really sucked and if anything needed buffs. Now there are reasons kassadin was strong he had mobility. Now lets look at lissandra though she isn't as mobile as many champs and low burst they have to do this because of her kit and playstyle. If they give her to much burst she litterally just W E's Ults and gets the most free kills ever especially when fed. If they give her to m uch manna she can poke a tiny bit and do the same thing. Don't tell me this isn't true because lissandra was becoming top pick mid lane for a while before they nerfed her a while back and still saw some play top. For the same reasons they nerfed leblanc and talon. Get a little ahead and then all you do is use your huge ass gape closer with your point and click cc or silence and get free kills all over the place. Also to add to this lissandra is also aoe and has a gap closer so is safer in lane then say annie. Riot doesn't like champions that if they get any sort of lead they can carry the entire game with no counter play at all it's almost like if karthus got ahead he had the ability to one shot the entire enemy team with his ult and it could go through zhonya's and banshee's

Also this is late game. Late game lissandra doesn't spam enough spells to need much manna. She just jumps in as if she is the wonder child of Jarvan and the spirit of every sucide bomber in existence and then blows all her stuff and either stomps teamfight or dies.
